question: Who has been appointed as the UN Environment Global Goodwill Ambassador.
explanation: British singer-songwriter Ellie Goulding has been appointed a Global Goodwill Ambassador for UN Environment. She will attend the UN Environment Assembly on December 4, 2017 in Nairobi. ver 2,000 heads of state, ministers, business leaders, UN officials and civil society representatives are gathering at the meeting to find new ways to deal with pollution. Ellie is also backing UN Environment's Clean Seas campaign.
